function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Perceived health risks related to COVID-19 in tourism activities","Impact":"Potential impact on individuals' well-being and inhibition of travel","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety measures, providing clear information on precautions, and promoting vaccination","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, contactless payment systems, and contact tracing apps","People":"Tourists, travelers, and hospitality staff","Owner":"Tourism industry, hospitality businesses, and government health agencies"},{"Description":"Psychological risks related to anxiety and fear about COVID-19","Impact":"Anticipated anxiety and mental discomfort may affect post-purchase affective reactions and decision-making","Mitigation":"Providing mental health support, clear communication about risks, and promoting positive emotional experiences","Technologies":"Mental health support apps, virtual counseling platforms, and personalized risk communication tools","People":"Tourists, travelers, and individuals making travel decisions","Owner":"Tourism industry, health organizations, and mental health professionals"}]}
